attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: This is the worst app since I always got emails to support trump when I only wanted to check out the app, so I suggest to stop sending me emails

attributes.title: Was not expecting this?
attributes.review: This app scanned my Apple Music library and added the u2 album back to my phone 💔

attributes.title: Worst app
attributes.review: This took me about three days to download. this app is not worth the time it has terrible content. And scams with the screenshots provided.

attributes.title: Smh
attributes.review: Took two days to download.... after it finished I went on it and it hacked my phone and I had to get a new one..

attributes.title: worst app ever
attributes.review: this app is by far the worst app i’ve ever had in my life. took days to download even though i had storage. once i finally downloaded it, it would always lag and very hard to manage. i hope no one ever downloads this app because it’s just so terrible. peace out ✌🏻

attributes.title: This app is dog🤮
attributes.review: This is the worst possible app that could ever exist no one like the app as you can see all the reviews so it should be deleted

attributes.title: Horrible 🤢🤢🤢
attributes.review: I only got the app to rate it 1 star because seriously I don’t even have to say anything my fellow gen-z know why

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: Glitchy, slow, nasty, and wrong in every way. Wish I could give it no stars.
App took 976 months to download. Hacked into my savings acc and took all my money. disappointed but not surprised. will no longer be supporting the president.

attributes.title: TERRIBLE
attributes.review: the app is so slow to download and it’s a terrible running app! Can’t stand it. i wish i could give it zero stars
